author: Bloomberg News
title: Scenes from a shutdown: How Canadian workers are facing the COVID-19 slump
description: From Calgary to Montreal, here are their tales
content:
They’d just bet millions on a hotel makeover, were waiting tables while pursuing their dream, or toiling in an already tough oil market.
Canadians have seen their world upended in a matter of days as the coronavirus shuts down huge swaths of the economy. Now… [+5945 chars]
